topComments.author: Earl Grylls
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Disneyland Matterhorn √© provavelmente o meu passeio favorito da Disney atualmente e de todos os tempos. Existem 2 lados. A maioria das pessoas e eu achamos que a esquerda √© mais r√°pida e excitante. No entanto, √© mais dif√≠cil andar! A direita √© um pouco mais lisa e suave, mas ainda assim divertida! Parece uma experi√™ncia diferente entre a noite e o dia tamb√©m. S√≥ n√£o se esque√ßa de permanecer sentado, por favor!  (Original) Disneyland Matterhorn is probably my favorite Disney ride currently and of all time.  There are 2 sides.  Most people and myself think the left is faster and more exciting.  However, it's more rough riding!  The right is a little more placade and smooth but still fun regardless!  It feels like a different experience between night and day as well.  Just don't forget to remain seated please!

topComments.author: Unbuttered Toast
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Passeio absolutamente incr√≠vel, muito emocionante, muito divertido e muito r√°pido. Quase sem espera (por volta das 23:00 em um fim de semana). Em um ponto o tren√≥ passou pela √°gua, n√£o ficou t√£o molhado, apenas um pouco de respingo. O tren√≥ subiu a montanha (foto) e desceu rapidamente  (Original) Absolutely amazing ride, very exhilarating, very fun, and very fast. Almost no wait (Around 11:00 pm on a weekend). At one point the bobsled went through water, did not get that wet, just a little splash. Sled wend all the way up the mountain (pictured) and descended quickly

topComments.author: Peter Xaymountry
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Outra grande experi√™ncia de passeio na montanha russa na Disneyl√¢ndia. Eu realmente gosto de andar de bobsleds no Matterhorn porque √© divertido e r√°pido. As filas de espera para quando eu partisse eram inexistentes, ent√£o fomos capazes de simplesmente caminhar at√© o port√£o para sentar no passeio. Parecia que a viagem durou apenas 10 segundos porque era muito r√°pido. Tirei meu bon√© nesta viagem, pois n√£o queria perder meu bon√© do Project Rock e guardar meus √≥culos de sol para que n√£o voasse.  (Original) Another great Rollercoaster like experience ride at Disneyland. I really enjoy Matterhorn Bobsleds ride because it's fun and fast. The standby lines for when I went was non existence so we were able to basically just walk to the gate to be seated in the ride. It felt like the ride was only 10 seconds because it was so fast. I took off my hat on this ride since I didn't want to lose my Project Rock hat and put my sunglasses away so it wouldn't fly away.

topComments.author: steve j
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â por isso que eu classifiquei este √≥timo passeio antigo com 3, √© porque o passeio √© t√£o acidentado e voc√™ ter√° dor de cabe√ßa e dor nas costas depois, isso √© uma promessa. O passeio em si √© √≥timo e os efeitos sonoros s√£o lindos üò®, mas o passeio √© muito vertiginoso e tamb√©m perdemos um copo de √°gua, a culpa √© nossa.  (Original) Here's why I rated this great older ride a 3, its because the ride is so bumpy and your will have a headache and backache afterwards, that's a promise.  The ride itself is great and the sound effects are pretty üò®, but the ride is very dizzying and we also lost a water tumbler on, thats our fault.

topComments.author: Will Riccs
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Quando penso na Disneyl√¢ndia, duas coisas me v√™m √† mente, o Castelo da Bela Adormecida e os tren√≥s Matterhorn. Constru√≠do em 1959, este agro penhasco vigia a fronteira da Tomorrowland e da fantasyland h√° mais de 6 d√©cadas. Eu sempre quis pilot√°-lo, mas sendo um cara da costa leste, nunca pensei que teria a oportunidade. Bem, em junho de 2022 consegui visitar a Disneyland e essa atra√ß√£o n√£o decepcionou. √â um pouco acidentado e espasm√≥dico, mas isso faz parte da experi√™ncia nessas montanhas-russas mais antigas.  (Original) When I think Disneyland two things pop into my mind, Sleeping beauty Castle and The Matterhorn bobsleds.  Built in 1959, this agro crag has been standing watch over the border of Tomorrowland and fantasyland for more than 6 decades. I have always wanted to ride it, but being an east coast guy I never thought id have the opportunity. Well, in June of 2022 I got to visit Disneyland and this attraction did not disappoint. It's a little bumpy and jerky but that's part of the experience on these older landmark coasters.

topComments.author: Johnny Porzio (John)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) um passeio de tren√≥ de aventura pelas encostas alpinas da Montanha Matterhorn, repleta de vistas deslumbrantes, quedas emocionantes e voc√™ pode at√© vislumbrar o lend√°rio abomin√°vel boneco de neve.  (Original) a adventurous bobsled ride down the alpine slopes of the Matterhorn Mountain ,filled with stunning views ,thrilling drops and you may even catch a glimpse of the legendary abominable snowman .

topComments.author: Rxses !
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este passeio foi bom, mas foi muito irregular e √°spero. Os efeitos sonoros foram legais, mas pode ser um pouco alto demais para pessoas sens√≠veis √† audi√ß√£o. Para mim, pelo menos, eu n√£o fiquei muito molhada. Tamb√©m n√£o houve grandes quedas, ent√£o n√£o precisa ter medo!  (Original) This ride was good, but it was very jerky and rough. The sound effects were cool but it may be a little to loud for people sensitive to hearing. For me at least, I didn't get too wet. There were no big drops either, so no need to be scared!

topComments.author: Sabrina Winkel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esperamos mais de uma hora por esse passeio e n√£o valeu a pena. o que era chato, pouca sombra. Uma vez no passeio foi MUITO espasm√≥dico, lento e inst√°vel. A vers√£o mais antiga era muito mais suave e r√°pida...  (Original) We waited over an hour for this ride and it was not worth it at all. the que was boring, not enough shade. Once on the ride it was VERY jerky, slow and shaky. The older version was a lot smoother and faster... not going on it again until it's fixed

topComments.author: Meghan Harrison
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu n√£o sei por que este passeio tem a reputa√ß√£o de mandar voc√™ para o quiropr√°tico. Eu pensei que Goofy's Sky School era muito mais espasm√≥dico. Adorei que √© uma montanha russa sem grandes quedas. Isso nem estava na minha lista de passeios obrigat√≥rios, mas por acaso tivemos uma vaga em nossa agenda e tentamos. Acabou sendo o passeio favorito meu e do meu filho de 7 anos em DL.  (Original) I'm not sure why this ride gets a reputation for sending you to the chiropractor. I thought Goofy's Sky School was much more jerky. I loved that it is a roller coaster without any big drops. This was not even on my list of must-do rides, but we happened to have an opening in our schedule and tried it. It ended up being both mine and my 7 year old son's favorite ride in DL.

topComments.author: DrkDsrt 76
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um dos melhores passeios do parque. √â super acidentado e cheio de curvas e quedas acentuadas! Uma pequena dica, use a fila single rider, pois a espera nunca ultrapassa os 10 minutos na fila single rider.  (Original) One of the best rides at the park. It‚Äôs super bumpy and full of sharp turns and drops! A little tip, use the single rider line, as the wait never gets longer than 10 minutes in the single rider line.
